game.beginning: In a world where magic and technology coexist, players take on the role of an orphaned teenager who discovers they possess rare magical abilities. Their village is attacked by a dark cult seeking to exploit these powers.
game.ending: After defeating the leader of the dark cult, the player must choose between destroying the source of their power or using it to become a legendary hero.
game.synopsis: The game follows the protagonist's journey as they unravel the mysteries behind their past and confront the darkness threatening their world. Along the way, they encounter allies who aid them in mastering their powers and uncovering hidden secrets about the cult, the magic, and themselves.
game.title: Awakening of Eridu
